channel.title: 张师傅的备忘录
channel.description: Recent content on 张师傅的备忘录

item.title: Linux git clone TLS error
item.description: 报错 fatal: unable to access '': GnuTLS recv error (-110): The TLS connection was non-properly terminated. 解决方法: apt-get install gnutls-bin git config --global http.sslVerify false git config --global http.postBuffer 1048576000

item.title: 设置Remix连接到本地
item.description: 1 set Node path 2 uninstall the old one npm uninstall -g remixd 3 install the new npm install -g @remix-project/remixd 4 set remix local server remixd -s <absolute-path> --remix-ide https://remix.ethereum.org 5 connect local server

item.title: Blog养成记(4) 增加tags等分类
